text: Mandal Parishad Primary School or Mandal Parishad Upper Primary School is the name of many Government Primary Schools in India and most particularly in the states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. These schools are established, supervised, and funded by the Mandal Parishad (taluka level local authorities of states).Mandal Parishad Primary Schools provide education for students from grades 1–5.Mandal Parishad Primary School ==References== ==See also== * Zilla Parishad High School * Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan Category:Schools in Andhra Pradesh Category:Schools in Telangana Category:Primary schools in India
title: Mandal Parishad Primary School
